profile.title: Professional Summary
profile.description: I am a hardworking and charismatic young woman with a passion for continuous learning and personal development. I am an adaptable information manager with extensive experience providing first-class results. I meet job demands and deadlines through diligent work ethic and dedication to quality. I always strive to achieve the highest standard possible, at any given task in any situation.

jobs.title: Volunteer Tutor
responsibilities: Providing guidance, advice, feedback, and support to learners
Advising about health, lifestyle, and social issues in disadvantaged communities
Monitoring and enhancing performance by providing tuition, encouragement, and constructive feedback
Helping students learn and understand new concepts and complete assignments

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
responsibilities: Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications
Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner, and monitor user reviews
Developed content and strategies for various social media platforms, including Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and TikTok

jobs.title: Sales Representative
responsibilities: Demonstrate and provide information on promoted products
Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
Establish, develop, and maintain positive business and customer relationships
Analyze the territory/market's potential, track sales and status reports

jobs.title: Research and Development Trainee
responsibilities: Develop a database of operational research questions mainly pertaining to TTP in consultation with the team lead, technical leads, and national professional officers
Identify and suggest extra reading materials for the SETMU team
Facilitate and assist in obtaining necessary ethical approval for planned research studies
Plan and conduct quantitative and qualitative research data analysis with introduction for appropriate implementation for research team
